com.android.test.runner

Class TestLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.test.runner.TestLoader

  • public class TestLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for loading JUnit3 and JUnit4 test classes given a set of potential class names.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestLoader(java.io.PrintStream writer)
      Create a TestLoader.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestLoader

        public TestLoader(java.io.PrintStream writer)
        Create a TestLoader.
        Parameters:
        writer - a PrintStream used for reporting errors.

    • Method Detail

      • loadClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String className)
        Loads the test class from the given class name.

        Will store the result internally. Successfully loaded classes can be retrieved via getLoadedClasses(), failures via getLoadFailures().

        Parameters:
        className - the class name to attempt to load
        Returns:
        the loaded class or null.

      • loadIfTest

        public java.lang.Class<?> loadIfTest(java.lang.String className)
        Loads the test class from the given class name.

        Similar to #loadClass(String, PrintStream)), but will ignore classes that are not tests.

        Parameters:
        className - the class name to attempt to load
        Returns:
        the loaded class or null.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        whether this TestLoader contains any loaded classes or load failures.

      • getLoadedClasses

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getLoadedClasses()
        Get the List) of classes successfully loaded via {@link #loadTest(String, PrintStream)} calls.

      • getLoadFailures

        public java.util.List<Failure> getLoadFailures()
        Get the List) of {@link Failure} that occurred during {@link #loadTest(String, PrintStream)} calls.
